Package interfaces

Interface BenchInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
public interface BenchInterface extends Remote
Operational interface of a remote object of type Bench. It provides the functionality to access the Bench.

  • Method Summary

    Description
    int
    callContestants(int coachId)
    Operation call contestants It is called by the coach to call the contestants to play in the trial.
    int
    callTrial()
    Operation call the trial It is called by the referee for the coach to call the contestants to the trial.

    Operation can end the game It is called by the referee to check if the game can end and wake up coaches and contestants to finish game.

      int callTrial() throws RemoteException
      Operation call the trial It is called by the referee for the coach to call the contestants to the trial.
      Returns:
      referee state
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • canEndTheGame

      int canEndTheGame(boolean endOfMatch) throws RemoteException
      Operation can end the game It is called by the referee to check if the game can end and wake up coaches and contestants to finish game.
      Parameters:
      endOfMatch - flag to check if the match has ended
      Returns:
      referee state
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

      ReturnInt followCoachAdvice(int strength, int contestantId) throws RemoteException
      Operation follow coach advice It is called by the contestant to follow the coach advice and go play.
      Parameters:
      strength - the contestant strength
      contestantId - the contestant id
      Returns:
      the contestant id and state
